title: Kid-focused Pok Pok Playroom iOS app gets major update to kick off 2022
content:
The phenomenal kids’ app Pok Pok Playroom has received a neat update today for the Busy Book toy featuring all-new dinosaur and Lunar New Year sections. This updated toy is great for open-ended play that encourages storytelling, fine motor skills, understanding cause and effect, and much more.

more…

The post Kid-focused Pok Pok Playroom iOS app gets major update to kick off 2022 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The great kids’ app Pok Pok Playroom has received an update today with all-new dinosaur and Lunar New Year sections in the Busy Book toy.
